title: AYO, SIS: ‘RuPaul’s Drag Race’ Announces Live Vegas Residency For 2020
text:
Thanks for signing up!

Oh, honey, do I have tea for you. RuPaul’s Drag Race has announced a 2020 Las Vegas residency: RuPaul’s Drag Race Live!

“RuPaul’s Drag Race Live! is an immersive, interactive thrill-ride for everyone who loves to laugh, dance and sing-along when a fabulous drag queen shakes her padded ass on stage,” Queen Ru said of the spectacle.

Drag Race alumni Aquaria, Yvie Oddly, Naomi Smalls, Kim Chi, Asia O’Hara, Eureka O’Hara, Kameron Michaels, Coco Montrese, Derrick Barry, India Ferrah, Kahanna Montrese and Shannel have been confirmed for the show.

There’ll be 7 Ru girls performing per show, meaning the above queens will be rotating on some kind of roster.

“Each live performance is packed with outrageous comedy, eye-popping fashions, over-the-top singing and dancing, heartwarming moments, plus twists and turns that will leave the audience gagging for more,” Drag Race released in a statement.

“The atmosphere of the show is interactive and encourages audience members’ participation, as if they were attending a live episode of the world-famous competition.”

According to their Ticketmaster page, RuPaul’s Drag Race Live! is looking to run from January 30 through to August 1.

Tickets will go on pre-sale Wednesday September 11 at 3AM AEST (literally 2 days away, so hurry and gather your pennies, binch). Tickets will then go on sale to the public Saturday September 13 at 3AM AEST.

For more info, head on over to their offical site.

Bam!
